      • clearContentObservers

        public void clearContentObservers()

      • getContentObserver

        public android.database.ContentObserver getContentObserver(android.net.Uri uri)
        Non-Android accessor. Returns the content observer registered with the given URI, or null if none registered.

        uri -
        Returns:
